title: When you will know if your essay is good enough? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, in my experience, once you’ve gotten to the point where you’re changing where the commas and periods are, it’s time to submit it. Editing works in an upside-down pyramid shape — first you edit your content to improve your argument, then you edit your composition to make your content clearer, then you make little grammatical changes to make your composition flow better. Once you’re fiddling with commas and periods, you’re good to go.

Only after several times of proofreading it. Step away from the role of student. Try to imagine you are a teacher and how she or he will react on your writing. What feels like missing? Or what have you written more about than it was needed? Besides that, you may address the professional writers from Primewriting for some assistance. The commitment and service their essay site offers to its customers is amazing.
